name: The united states of america
startIntroPart1: President, the United States of America is a land of immigration, opportunities, optimism and determination, and it has risen above all other weakening nations, unable to equal such power.
startIntroPart2: President, will you show to the world the legitimacy of the American way of life, and spread the flame of liberty to all mankind? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Have you got any oil for me?
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.
introduction: The people of the United States of America welcome you.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
